entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 near noon then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
